content:
Dear Eng.Mohamed ,

Thank you for your email and feedback regarding the app. We are glad to hear that most of the issues have been resolved and the app is functioning smoothly.

Regarding the issues you have raised:

We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Our team has reviewed and fixed the issue. The app will now only display products that are available in the stock.

Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We have reviewed and made necessary changes. Please note that the search and filter is for category name only and not for the product.

We are glad to hear that the banners are working now. Our team has also fixed the issue with the links in the backend app image section.

Our team has reviewed and fixed the issue. The cart will now function correctly even if the client is not logged in.

Thank you for pointing this out. We have made the necessary changes to update the label from "أستمارة التواصل" to "نموذج التواصل".

Our team has reviewed and fixed the small gray space issue on top of every screen.

Regarding the support period, we understand your concerns but we delivered the documentation and the android version from two monthes also we uploaded android version and we are providing your side with support right now
And regarding IOS we requested Designs two monthes ago and we just recieved it a week ago 

We are requesting to arrange delivery meeting also we need to migrate the plugin and prepaire production environment 

Thank you for your patience and understanding. Please note that the support period has started from 16-2-2023.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
